author: cms-btv-pog
body: Bugfix for the BoostedDoubleSV tagger. The bug is expected to manifest itself in extremely rare instances where a jet has only one constituent. The fix has no impact on RECO (since the tagger is not run there) but could impact MiniAOD in those rare instances.
title: Bugfix in the BoostedDoubleSV tagger (81X)
